author: lhazlewood
msg: SHIRO-116 - ensured that an implicit IniRealm would be created if the startup configuration contains [users] or [roles] ini sections.  Also provided the ability to turn caching on or off at a global level via CachingRealm.setCachingEnabled.

author: gcrawford
msg: TRINIDAD-1635 Trinidad 2 - nullpointerexception thrown when partial state saving turned on
Support using the token cache when there is a stateManagementStrategy available

Because StateManagementStrategy.restoreView does not support passing in state, we are pushing cached state on the request and having the CoreResponseStateManager return that if it's available. I will log a JSF bug asking that StateManagementStrategy.restoreView take the state object returned from StateManagementStrategy.saveView.
